1 using FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList;
2 using System;
3 using UnityEngine;
4 
5 namespace FullInspector.Internal {
9  public class ArrayPropertyEditor<T> : PropertyEditor<T[]> {
10  private PropertyEditorChain _propertyEditor = PropertyEditor.Get(typeof(T), typeof(T));
11 
12  public override T[] Edit(Rect region, GUIContent label, T[] elements) {
13  if (elements == null) {
14  elements = new T[0];
15  }
16 
17  ArrayListAdaptor<T> adapter = GetAdapter(elements);
18 
19  Rect titleRect = new Rect(region);
20  titleRect.height = GetTitleHeight();
21  ReorderableListGUI.Title(titleRect, label);
22 
23  Rect bodyRect = new Rect(region);
24  bodyRect.y += GetTitleHeight();
25  bodyRect.height -= GetTitleHeight();
26  ReorderableListGUI.ListFieldAbsolute(bodyRect, adapter, DrawEmpty);
27 
28  return adapter.StoredArray;
29  }
30 
31  private T DrawItem(Rect rect, T item) {
32  return (T)_propertyEditor.FirstEditor.Edit(rect, GUIContent.none, item);
33  }
34 
35  private ArrayListAdaptor<T> GetAdapter(T[] elements) {
36  return new ArrayListAdaptor<T>(elements, DrawItem, GetItemHeight);
37  }
38 
39  private void DrawEmpty(Rect rect) {
40  }
41 
42  private float GetItemHeight(T element) {
43  float height = _propertyEditor.FirstEditor.GetElementHeight(GUIContent.none, element);
44  if (height < ReorderableListGUI.DefaultItemHeight) {
45  return ReorderableListGUI.DefaultItemHeight;
46  }
47  return height;
48  }
49 
50  private float GetTitleHeight() {
51  return ReorderableListGUI.CalculateTitleHeight();
52  }
53 
54  public override float GetElementHeight(GUIContent label, T[] elements) {
55  if (elements == null || elements.Length == 0) {
56  const int heightOfEmpty = 20;
57  return GetTitleHeight() + heightOfEmpty;
58  }
59 
60  return GetTitleHeight() + ReorderableListGUI.CalculateListFieldHeight(GetAdapter(elements));
61  }
62 
63  public override GUIContent GetFoldoutHeader(GUIContent label, object element) {
64  if (element == null) {
65  return label;
66  }
67 
68  return new GUIContent(label.text + " (" + ((T[])element).Length + " elements)",
69  label.tooltip);
70  }
71  }
72 
73  public static class ArrayPropertyEditor {
74  public static IPropertyEditor TryCreate(Type dataType) {
75  if (dataType.IsArray == false) {
76  return null;
77  }
78 
79  Type elementType = dataType.GetElementType();
80 
81  Type editorType = typeof(ArrayPropertyEditor<>).MakeGenericType(elementType);
82  return (IPropertyEditor)Activator.CreateInstance(editorType);
83  }
84  }
85 }
